name: The Ultimate Kap Pack
description:
Heyo! I've decided to compile a collection of almost every surviving gamedev project I've built in the last 12+ years! Not counting different builds of the same game, there are about 39 different projects included in this collection! It felt very cathartic to put this together, but I hope other people find some of these interesting.

Here's a list of highlights:

  • BUDD (Classic)
  • Frostbite Crawl
  • Sonic Round 7
  • Lana's Nightmare
  • Kappa's Adventure (2015 Demo)
  • Crystal Heart (Various Builds)
  • The RPG Maker Predecessor to BUDD
  • BUDD (Modern) Engine test
  • Fantasy Zone HD demo
  • Prototypes for the very earliest Kappa games
  • Archives from the Steam Workshop long thought lost
  • And many, MANY more!

They should be split up by completion status. Finished games, anything relating to Crystal Heart, demos with a playable amount of work done, prototypes with a few mechanics but no gameplay loop yet, and projects that take a bit of extra work to get running.

Some were omitted just because I didn't think they were interesting (like basic character controllers), homebrew that would require an emulator, or because they were mods for other games.

 Or because I'm still developing them.

A huge thank you to all my friends and collaborators that helped me with these over the years!
